name: Watermelon Soup With Red Summer Berries and Lime
keywords: berries, cherries, watermelon, dessert, summer, vegan, vegetarian

recipeInstructions.text: Remove rind and seeds from watermelon. Cut flesh into chunks, and puree in blender. Strain into bowl (there should be about 4 cups).
Mix puree with sugar and lime juice. Chill 2 hours.
To serve, cut blackberries and raspberries in half. Pit cherries, and cut in half. Slice strawberries.
Divide fruits into six chilled soup bowls. Pour watermelon mixture over them, and serve immediately.
